sentences.en: A flourishing and prosperous panorama spread out before our eyes.
sentences.cn: 一派欣欣向荣的景象展现在我们的眼前.

sentences.en: a panorama of life in England 400 years ago
A vast panorama of the valley lay before us.
sentences.cn: 山谷的广阔全景展现在我们面前.

sentences.en: All of this unfolds into a panorama of beautifully balanced fauna and flora.
sentences.cn: 组合成了奇异的“动植物王国”.

sentences.en: From the summit there is a superb panorama of the Alps.
sentences.cn: 从峰巅俯瞰,阿尔卑斯山壮丽的景色尽收眼底.

sentences.en: He loved the changing panorama of the street -- to see and be seen as he dined.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢不断变化的 街景,边吃着饭,边看着行人,同时也让行人看到自己.

sentences.en: Horton looked out over a panorama of fertile valleys and gentle hills.
sentences.cn: 霍顿向外望去，肥沃的谷地和平缓的丘陵尽收眼底。

sentences.en: In your home, panorama fireplace can be installed at any place.
sentences.cn: 在您家里的任一位置都可安装瞻景式壁炉.

sentences.en: Karen watched the panorama of passing people with wide eyes.
sentences.cn: 凯伦瞪着大眼观看着一连串过往的人群.

sentences.en: Panorama Outside the hospital room the patients are waiting anxiously.
sentences.cn: (全景)诊室外病人焦急地等待着.

sentences.en: The LCROSS impact was just off bottom center of the panorama.
sentences.cn: LCROSS撞击点位于这张全景照片的底部中间附近.

sentences.en: The panorama hall is a perfect combination of scientific and artistic beauty.
sentences.cn: 全景画是科学美与艺术美的完美结合的典型作品.

sentences.en: The panorama of color and action which fills the world is taken for granted.
sentences.cn: 大千世界中的五光十色千变万化的景象被人看作是理所当然的.

sentences.en: The panorama of color fill the world of flower!
sentences.cn: 缤纷的色彩充满了花的世界.

sentences.en: The whole panorama , as usual, was adorned by the mellow distinctness of early morning.
sentences.cn: 和往常一样, 一切都笼罩在清晨柔和的雾霭中.

sentences.en: There is a superb panorama of the mountains from the hotel.
sentences.cn: 从旅馆可饱览峰峦叠嶂的雄伟景观。

trans.tran_cn: 全景画，全景照片，一连串景象或事，概论
trans.tran_en: an impressive view of a wide area of land
